name: Deul
summary: Deul is a fast paced action packed shooting game that will test your reflexes, accuracy and timing. Try to out-draw opponents as you clash across the world and duel your way through China, London, Russia and Brazil. Let the blood fly with your overkill as each victory will earn you points and increase your score, get a higher score to climb up our leaderboards. Play additional mini-games modes to farm tokens! Shoot junk to not get killed or drag your ragdoll around to kick your opponent's butt!
